comment: A simple feature as cropping a video turns the saved video into pixelated garbage. I can't believe this hasn't been fixed yet. There has been at least half a dozen updates since I first sent a report about this. I can't be the only one that is getting this problem or nobody gives a shitto fix it. I'll stick with Samsung gallery photo editor it works fine.
key sentence: Crop a video, and the saved video becomes pixelated.
